ca_cert.description: The path to the JenkinsCi self-signed certificate.

server_url.description: The URL of the JenkinsCI server to connect to.

description.description: The (optional) description of the JenkinsCI job.

disabled.description: When this option is checked, no new builds of this project will be executed.

display_name.description: If set, the optional display name is shown for the job throughout the Jenkins web GUI; it needs not be unique among all jobs, and defaults to the job name.

hash.description: This internal parameter keeps track of modifications to the template when it is not embedded into the job configuration; the hash is computed each time the status is refreshed and compared with the value stored here, so that any change to the template can be detected.

name.description: The unique name of the JenkinsCI job.

parameters.description: The set of parameters to be set in the template to generate a valid config.xml file.

template.description: The configuration file template; it can be provided inline (e.g. as an HEREDOC), as a web URL pointing to a text file (http://... or https://...), or as filesystem URL (file://...).
